00036 TimerHandler::TimerHandler(Comm *comm, RangeServer *range_server) : m_comm(comm), m_range_server(range_server) {
00037   int error;
00038 
00039   if ((error = m_comm->set_timer(range_server->get_timer_interval(), this)) != Error::OK) {
00040     HT_ERRORF("Problem setting timer - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00041     exit(1);
00042   }
00043 
00044   return;
00045 }

00051 void TimerHandler::handle(Hypertable::EventPtr &event_ptr) {
00052   int error;
00053 
00054   try {
00055 
00056     if (event_ptr->type == Hypertable::Event::TIMER) {
00057       m_range_server->do_maintenance();
00058       if ((error = m_comm->set_timer(m_range_server->get_timer_interval(), this)) != Error::OK) {
00059         HT_ERRORF("Problem setting timer - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00060         exit(1);
00061       }
00062     }
00063     else {
00064       HT_ERRORF("Unexpected event - %s", event_ptr->to_str().c_str());
00065     }
00066   }
00067   catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00068     HT_ERRORF("%s '%s'", e.code(), e.what());
00069   }
00070 }
